code: import React from'react';import{ExternalLink}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectsSection=_ref=>{let{projects}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"section section-bg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid-2",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-gradient",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'space-between',marginBottom:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{fontSize:'1.5rem',fontWeight:'600',color:'#60a5fa'},children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExternalLink,{style:{color:'#9ca3af',cursor:'pointer'},size:20})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'#a78bfa',fontWeight:'500',marginBottom:'1rem'},children:project.period}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'#d1d5db',marginBottom:'1.5rem',lineHeight:'1.75'},children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',gap:'0.5rem'},children:project.tech.map(tech=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tech-tag",children:tech},tech))})]},index))})]})});};export default ProjectsSection;
